price: Waan isaan jedhan irratti obsi; fageenya gaarii isaan irraa fagaadhu.
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرٗا جَمِيلٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-uh'jur'hum hajran jamīlan
